item.title: Setting Up Git Send-Email with Gmail
item.description: Learn how to configure git send-email with Gmail, including 2FA setup, app passwords, and sending your first patch to a mailing list.

item.title: Setting Up Git Send-Email with Gmail
item.description: Using git send-email allows you to send patches directly from the command line, a workflow favored by many open-source projects (like the Linux kernel and SourceHut). This guide walks you through setting up git send-email with Gmail and sending your first patch.
